cs3340.project.runninggame.World

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs3340.project.runninggame.World.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the player's size, velocity, and player state while also handling the loading of it's texture and animations.
    Since:
    11/28/2015
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Jesus Ramos

    • Nested Class Summary

      The enum PlayerState.

      Constructor and Description
      Player(float UNIT_SCALE, int x, int y)
      Creates a player by loading all it's texture/animations, setting it's position, default velocity, acceleration, playerstate, stateTime, and size.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(float UNIT_SCALE,
              int x,
              int y)
        Creates a player by loading all it's texture/animations, setting it's position, default velocity, acceleration, playerstate, stateTime, and size.
        Parameters:
        UNIT_SCALE - the scale of the player within the world i.e. 16x16 for this game.
        x - the x coordinate position of the player on the map.
        y - the y coordinate position of the player on the map
